name: BankRupt (Arcreuss, fuegoglol, Benjamin Robert, SxUranus, Larrio, Zankanotachi)
name_original: BankRupt (Arcreuss, fuegoglol, Benjamin Robert, SxUranus, Larrio, Zankanotachi)
description:
BankRupt

En concours/>

Theme : 

You Are Not The Main Character

Constraints :

I Want My Cut, Scoring, Free For All

Description :

BankRupt is an Arcade game where you assist Pablo, the greatest thief of Italy. Pablo  has planned the heist of a big national bank during the 6 past months and choosed 2 gang members to help him.

Your goal is to sympathise with him by bringing him more item, load more cash than your parter in the van and of course escape with him

The more you've been helpfull, the bigger will be your cut.

Controls : Keyboard : 
  • Move : WASD
  • Slap : Left Click
  • Pickup / Drop Item : F
Gamepad : 
  • Move : Left Stick
  • Slap : A Button
  • Pickup / Drop Item : X Button
Required :

BankRupt is an online multiplayer game using the Epic Online Services. In order to play you'll need an Epic Games account.

Team :

Guichard Lucas : Network 
Mora Hugo : Network
Lou Lori : Core Gameplay
Perrod Ethan : Core Gameplay
Ponal Mathieu : Level Design
Robert Benjamin : Level Design
